CustomField.description: So we can set both the account owner field and the team member
CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT(Team_Member_Name__r.Sales_Org__c) ,'HNBF','H&B Partner' ,'PAS','PEO-ASO Partner' ,'HRS','401k Partner' ,'PC','P&C Partner' ,'MS','Merchant Services Representative' ,'PEO','PEO Centric Rep' ,'TAA','TAA Partner' ,'BenAdmin','BenAdmin Sales Rep' ,'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The role name used for the Account Team Member (if any)
CustomField.label: Account Team Role
